Desc.entry: An independent limited company with charitable aims, which runs projects and provides facilities for the benefit of local people. Has a community allotment and runs 5 morning sessions a week. Offers a women only session on Mondays (see separate entry) and runs healthy cooking workshops for project users. Aims to provide a therauputic environment for people to learn about organic horticulture. Holds public meetings 4 to 6 times per year. Company limited by guarantee no 3858558.
